Easy, Secure And
Non-custodial Crypto Payments

SolPayments is a payment processing platform for crypto-currencies that allows individuals and businesses of all sizes to accept payments on their websites, online shops, and decentralized apps.

Check out the demo

Why Use SolPayments?

We've got everything you need to start accepting payments.

Fast

Payments can take as low as a few seconds to complete. You no longer have to wait hours to fully receive your crypto payments.

Affordable

Our fees are a low flat-rate (as in cents) regardless of the amount being paid. You get to keep more of your payments.

Non-custodial

We don't hold or control, and cannot touch the payments that you receive. Only you have access to your money.

Available Everywhere

Anyone anywhere in the world can use SolPayments. Nothing and no one is stopping you from accepting payments.

Our Vision

Payments processing for decentralized commerce

Our overarching goal is to make it possible for anyone from anywhere in the world to set up shop and start accepting payments from their customers without having to ask anyone for permission. And, without having to trust any third parties. We want to build a future in which commerce is decentralized, permissionless, and censorship-resistant. We achieve this by using smart contracts deployed on the Solana blockchain.
